SEARCH
Package org.team21.game.controllers

Class StartGameController

java.lang.Object
org.team21.game.controllers.StartGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameFlowManager
public class StartGameController extends Object implements GameFlowManager
This class represents the controller for starting and managing the phases of the game. It facilitates user interaction through a command-line interface and executes various game commands. Implements GameFlowManager interface.
Version:
: 1.0.0
Author:
: Nishith Soni
